intro.description:
In this tutorial, you learn how to create a sis-package. To follow the tutorial, you must have a key pair defined in Carbide.ui.
If the views you need to perform this tutorial are not visible, select Window -> Show View and select the view you want.
Follow the tutorial steps in order. After each step, move to the next step by clicking the button located at the bottom of the step: Click to Perform (if you want the step to be performed automatically), Click to Skip (if you want to perform the step manually) or Click to Complete (if no automatisation is available). If you do not use the buttons to move between steps, the automated tutorial functions become inavailable. To start this tutorial, click the Click to Begin button below.

item.title: Open an existing theme.
item.description: Select File -> Open Theme. Choose the theme to be opened and click Open.

item.title: Create a new sis-package.
item.description: Select Tools -> Create New SIS-Package. The New SIS-Package wizard opens. In the Content to be included field, check the boxes of those theme components which you want to include in the package.Click Next. If you created a password for the Tutorial key, enter that password in the Password field. Click Finish. The package is saved as a .sis file in the desired location.
